review: I purchased this because the Roku 3 that I tried to install in the living room could not receive the wireless signal from the room directly above it. After getting sick of using a streaming Blu Ray for a year, I took a chance on this product being able to outperform Roku's wireless receiving capability, which it did with no problem. It will be heavily linked to your Amazon account, but I did not find this to be a problem. All the apps I needed are there (good library), and they work quite well so far. The voice prompt also works well, particularly once you figure out the nuances of using it and getting the right search result every time.
author: JCW
